channel.title: sillygwailo tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from sillygwailo.

item.description: I have until July 12th to decide whether I’m going to Ottawa to watch 3 basketball games. https://t.co/BUa8ebSS2m
@stephentweedale https://t.co/XMXo84VQoB

Look what arrived in the mail! https://t.co/o4S1qRC4o4
You have to pay postage, but you can get your free Platinum Jubilee lapel pin from @monarchist at https://t.co/Y84WwptdEr
@stephentweedale I sometimes have to remind opponents of the NDP that they, the opponents themselves, call the NDP the tax & spend party.
@davewiner People are offering to shake my hand again, so things are more or less back to normal here in Toronto.
@ItsJennyJ For those reading this, there were a good many more than 20 bikes on Lakeshore Blvd. today.

I was in Wallace Emerson today. https://t.co/eaBOeLU2En
6 people remarked on my DJ Shadow shirt tonight, breaking the record of zero for the past few months. They were all in Wallace Emerson.
I’m thinking of moving to Wallace Emerson, that’s what I’m trying to say.
@adamrg The Upside Down is still a good premise. Is that still a thing in the most recent two seasons? (I’m reading about it but stopping at the spoilers, so maybe I haven’t totally given up on it.)

@WattsHarry3 Oh, you must not know then. There aren’t enough trails and (safe) bike lanes in Toronto. The popularity of #ActiveTO shows that. Let me know if you need some resources on what needs to be done in Toronto. Follow #BikeTO hashtag, that’s a good start.
@WattsHarry3 No benefit? Another weird lie. What’s up with all the lying?

@WattsHarry3 Actually, I think you’re wrong about that one. If I recall correctly, on that day, I don’t think it was as busy as it was normally. The weather wasn’t so great that day. Maybe you recall differently. We’re you there that day? I was.
@WattsHarry3 I admit, I too was shocked when I learned that #ActiveTO was 0.02% of the City of Toronto’s operating budget. https://t.co/ZTphq1Jg01

@WattsHarry3 More than one person, I’m pretty sure you meant. I appreciate you looking at how many people used it and enjoyed it, as you can see in the many photos and videos. Thanks for coming sound on this.

@WattsHarry3 Literally no one using it? How can you lie like that? I was just there and there was minimum one person (me) plus I saw other people there too. So that’s wrong. What else are you wrong about? Who else do you lie to?

PARADE by Mimi Lien. https://t.co/JoKQQBOhNL
https://t.co/QzU4cWWH62
https://t.co/GeQsSJunzl
https://t.co/NlIKGifcIE
https://t.co/BrwwOhUsXK

@adamrg Probably because it’s a coming-of-age series, and I don’t remember much of my childhood. Nothing traumatic, it just seems zapped from my memory, my theory being it’s from having spent so much time in front of a computer monitor. It doesn’t hit any nostalgia buttons.
@adamrg Reading about it, more like it. I stopped watching after the second season.
The only song that’s better than Kate Bush’s “Running Up That Hill” is Kate Bush’s “Running Up That Hill (A Deal With God) [2012 Remix]”.

“This is not an age in which anything can happen and be covered up.”
He must not have heard the phrase “Flood the zone with shit.”

This morning. https://t.co/I1JbHu4Yty
This afternoon. https://t.co/l6BcCpHlI5
This afternoon. https://t.co/qpp2dA8OK4
This afternoon. https://t.co/PCLsStt8Ol
In an alternate universe, I stayed in line to see the Thomas Fisher Rare Book Library at Doors Open Toronto and met my true love and lived happily ever after.
This is what I missed yesterday by not standing in line for an hour (an hour before closing), along with meeting my true love and living happily ever after, I assume. https://t.co/ss9k34vVGY
This afternoon. https://t.co/dQGbzTE2id
This afternoon. https://t.co/m4vP5rTpx8
@Doors_OpenTO I can work with that. Thanks! For next year, my hope is to make an app that will plot out a walking/cycling/transit/driving (in that order) route from a randomly selected few sites.

Is there a JSON (or other open data format) representation of the @Doors_OpenTO locations? It’s hard to choose between the over 100 sites open to the public this weekend and I’d like to make a random picker to ease my decision fatigue. #DOT22
@daringfireball Here’s the scene in question. https://t.co/8ET0SNSz1V
@uncleweed So far so good. A quick break to get snacks, and on to the next one!

I made this for dinner tonight. https://t.co/SlZzATZ36l
The fork is just for show. I ate it with a spoon.
